subject: Improve test documentation with business rules and formulas
body:
Each test case now includes:
- businessRule: Explains WHY the test exists (accounting/tax logic)
- formula: Step-by-step calculation showing HOW expected values derive
- source: Reference to documentation (CALCULATIONS.md, IAS 38, OECD, etc.)

The expanded test view in the UI now displays these fields with
appropriate formatting:
- Business Rule: Blue-tinted box explaining the accounting principle
- Formula: Monospace green text showing the calculation steps
- Source: Reference badge linking to standards/documentation
